title: Wine Quality MLOps Pipeline
features: Designed and automated an end‑to‑end MLOps pipeline for wine quality prediction, integrating data ingestion, validation, transformation, modeling, and deployment.
Implemented robust experiment tracking and model versioning with MLflow, enabling reproducible training, hyperparameter tuning, and seamless A/B testing.
Delivered a production‑grade inference service via FastAPI and Docker, achieving low‑latency predictions while maintaining automated CI/CD with GitHub Actions.
